name: 2D Shooter Project (blimpgorbus)
description:
3 of my proposed Modifications are 

1 somewhere in the level complete screen will some sort of "mission report" just being text dialogue for some very small story

2. having the enemy being replaced with the player ships, and the player being replaced with the enemy

3. increasing the speed of chaser enemies to have be more of a threat to the player. 

quick side note, on the third screenshot, the Nvidia display for my laptop showed up while i screenshotted, that's not something i put  in through unity.
